narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This 1st prelicense inspection for a Class “A” license and exit briefing were conducted with the applicant.
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
The license fee in the amount of $225.00 dollars must be mailed to the following address:
USDA-APHIS-Animal Care
2150 Centre Ave. Bldg B, Mail Stop 3W11
Fort Collins, CO 80526
